hero.title: Our Story
hero.description: Over 15 years connecting adventurers with the magic of the Ecuadorian Amazon

story.title: How It All Began
story.paragraph1: Río Delfín Lodge was born in 2008 from the dream of Jacob Tangoy, a passionate local naturalist who wanted to share the incredible biodiversity of his Amazon home with the world.
story.paragraph2: What began as informal expeditions for friends became an internationally recognized operation, always maintaining the personal touch and authenticity that characterizes us.
story.paragraph3: Today, we remain a family business that takes pride in offering intimate and authentic experiences, working hand in hand with local communities to preserve this natural paradise.
